awd_titl_txt: Automating the Undergraduate Engineering Materials          Laboratory.
awd_abstract_narration: Under this project, the materials science and engineering strength of           materials laboratory will be automated.  A bench-top Instron Model 1011,        1000 pound load capacity will be added to the laboratory to supplement          an existing 20,000 pound load capacity machine.  The new instrument is          equipped with an IEEE 488 bus that will be interfaced with a Macintosh          Plus computer equipped with a National Instruments interface board and          labVIEW software.  The students will be able to learn real time control         and computer data acquisition and analysis.  The experiments planned            include the testing of both metals and polymers.  In addition, the data         acquisition system will be used to measure the electrical properties of         materials, including semiconductors.
